citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) did not perform a semiannual review of the program for
humane care and use of animals. The last program review was conducted on April 15, 2025, and was due again in
October 2025. The review is 3 months overdue. The review helps to ensure protocol changes, personnel changes,
adverse events, and other issues are addressed in a timely manner. Correct by ensuring the IACUC conducts a review of
the program for the humane use of animals every 6 months. Correct by: March 31, 2026.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) did not perform a semiannual review of the animal facilities.
The last facility review was conducted on April 15, 2025, and was due again in October 2025. The review is 3 months
overdue. The review is necessary to ensure IACUC oversight of the facility, ensure repairs or deficiencies are noted and
addressed, and to ensure the welfare of the animals being housed within the facility. Correct by ensuring the IACUC
conducts semiannual reviews of the facility's animal facilities. Correct by: March 31, 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(1) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) did not perform a semiannual review of the program for 
humane care and use of animals. The last program review was conducted on April 15, 2025, and was due again in 
October 2025. The review is 3 months overdue. The review helps to ensure protocol changes, personnel changes, 
adverse events, and other issues are addressed in a timely manner. Correct by ensuring the IACUC conducts a review of 
the program for the humane use of animals every 6 months. Correct by: March 31, 2026. 
2.31(c)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) did not perform a semiannual review of the animal facilities. 
The last facility review was conducted on April 15, 2025, and was due again in October 2025. The review is 3 months 
overdue. The review is necessary to ensure IACUC oversight of the facility, ensure repairs or deficiencies are noted and 
addressed, and to ensure the welfare of the animals being housed within the facility. Correct by ensuring the IACUC 
conducts semiannual reviews of the facility's animal facilities. Correct by: March 31, 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
